sentences.en: A gap in the A ring, also named for its discoverer, is called Encke's division.
sentences.cn: 在A环中还有一条缝, 也以其发现者命名, 称为恩克(Encke)环缝.

sentences.en: And Francoise - Bar - Luc and Xinuo Xi - montagny is HIV ( hiv ) of the discoverer.
sentences.cn: 而弗朗索瓦丝 -巴尔 -西诺西和吕克-蒙塔尼则是艾滋病病毒 ( hiv ) 的发现者.

sentences.en: Captain Cook was a great discoverer.
sentences.cn: 库克船长是伟大的发现者.

sentences.en: Columbus was the discoverer of the New Continent.
sentences.cn: 哥伦布是新大陆的发现者.

sentences.en: He was the discoverer of the element radium.
His tone and look assured her he had not been the discoverer of the hoard.
sentences.cn: 他的声调和表情使她确信他不是发现宝藏的人.

sentences.en: In general, comets are named after their discoverer, either a person.
sentences.cn: 总的来说，彗星是以发现者，或者说是人的名字命名的。

sentences.en: Louis Pasteur was the discoverer of bacteria.
Madame Curie will always be remembered as the discoverer of radium.
sentences.cn: 居里夫人作为镭的发现者将永远为人们所怀念。

sentences.en: Tasmania was named after his discoverer, A . J . Tasman.
sentences.cn: 塔斯曼尼亚岛是以它的发现者塔斯曼为名的.

sentences.en: Tasmania was named after its discoverer A . J.
sentences.cn: 这个海峡是以它的发现者命名的.

sentences.en: Tasmania was named after its discoverer, A . J . Tasman.
sentences.cn: 塔斯曼尼亚岛是以其发现者塔斯曼的名字命名的.

sentences.en: The discoverer is entitled to reply, why didn't you?
sentences.cn: 回答问题引出了发现者, 你为什么不试着这样做 呢 ?

sentences.en: The discoverer of the Pacific walked " valorous and serene " into the public square and was beheaded.
sentences.cn: 这位太平洋的发现者 “ 英勇无畏,泰然自若地 ” 步入公共广场,被斩首处决.

sentences.en: The discoverer will also have the privelage of naming the particle!
sentences.cn: 发现者还享有对发现微粒的命名权!

sentences.en: The Mozart’s frog’s whistle-like call resembles musical notes when mapped as an audiospectrogram, a fact that inspired discoverer Blair Hedges to name the species after the famed composer.
sentences.cn: 莫扎特蛙口哨般的叫声在声谱图上的反应就像音符一般，受此启发，发现者布莱尔·赫齐斯用那著名的作曲家的名字给这个物种命名。

sentences.en: This island was named after his discoverer.
sentences.cn: 该岛以其发现者的名字命名.
我们很快就查明了真相.

words.tran_cn: 发现，发觉；被发现的事物
